content: Is anyone else having issues gettig their merch or getting the store to answer you?
Yes, still waiting

yeah, one of my orders doesn’t even show up in my account/order history so I’m just considering the charge a campaign donation at this point lol. Figured the store operations got overwhelmed by volume
I am still waiting for my merch. But I know two people who received theirs this week. I am hopeful.
I got my yard sign this week! Waiting on other things, but I think they are just suuuuper busy
Same -- no stuff and not even showing up on the account. I agree that there may be high volume and they just didn't have enough.
I see "waiting fulfillment".
mmm my orders wont even show
I heard others who have the same issue
Same here.  My shirts said they would be ready the following week, but that was 3+ weeks ago. Kinda bummed about that. I got my Deadheads for Kamala shirt within 3 days of my donation there.

I ordered a poster and buttons in early August. Still say awaiting fulfillment. IF it was anything like Hillary's campaign, we'll get them in early October. I think going from Biden to Harris overwhelmed them and they haven't recovered.
On the positive side, my sweatshirt from the shop’s Designers for Democracy collection did arrive yesterday and it’s gorgeous!
I just got mine so they may be shipping now
I received my tote but I haven't rec'd my signs yet.
Just got a text from the campaign that says they "longer than usual processing times" regarding orders.

Kind of figured that. I'm hoping that I get at least by October. Going from Biden to Harris-mania within a week or so must have pretty much broken the supply chain. I will think of it as a donation if nothing else.

I haven't received 3 orders but I did receive 2 texts today that they've been "hard at work to keep up with the high demand & to get your order into your hands! We are working to fulfill these orders as quickly as possible & will follow up when we have updates. Thank you again for your patience & understanding." An hour later I received an email with the same wording.
The store sent me email *"We wanted to personally reach out and apologize for the longer-than-usual processing times on your recent order from the Harris-Walz store."*
Same here, Carolyn.
Yes, and received text today saying they are so sorry but demand is overwhelming them. A good problem to have!
Thanks all for the updates. Going from 0 to 100% interest in a week def. overwhelmed them. I'm sure most items bought in August will be mailed at least at the end of Sept. or early Oct.
I also just got an email today about order delays
Yes same; did receive an email apology.
